IndexedFeatureCollection(FeatureCollection)

Initializes a new instance of the IndexedFeatureCollection class that contains elements copied from the specified collection and that has the same initial capacity as the number of elements copied.

public IndexedFeatureCollection(FeatureCollection collection)

Parameters

collection FeatureCollection

The IndexedFeatureCollection whose elements are copied to the new collection.

Remarks

Exceptions

collection is a null reference.
